name: random promt (4)
content:
Create a realistic portrait (100% like the face), High-quality. 8K portrait. A woman with long, wavy dark brown hair is smiling warmly at the camera.
She is wearing a soft pink, long-sleeved shirt and denim jeans
She has a pair of sunglasses perched on top of her head.
A silver bracelet is visible on her left wrist.
She is wearing white sneakers with blue accents.
Pose and Action: The woman is sitting upright on a white horse, holding the reins with her hands resting near the saddle.
The Horse: The horse is white with a light mane and is equipped with a colorful, patterned saddle blanket and a yellow and brown striped bridle.
The photo is taken in a sunlit forest or park with many tall pine trees in the background under a clear blue sky.
The ground is composed of reddish-brown dirt or pine needles.
Lighting and Composition: The image is lit by bright, natural daylight, creating a cheerful and adventurous mood. make it realistic 
Add a small handwritten-style watermark that reads ‘Prompt by: anph21’. Use a beautiful cursive font, thin strokes, low opacity, placed at the bottom right. Don’t change the face of reference image

name: welcome-2026 (5)

metadata.title: Tạm biệt 2025 - Chào 2026
metadata.description: Cung chúc tân xuân Bính Ngọ

content: Ultra-bright cute advertising studio poster featuring a cheerful, playful man of any age and ethnicity, based on the provided uploaded image. He is smiling and laughing joyfully, sitting happily on a glossy pastel 3D number "0" while leaning playfully against an oversized rounded pastel 3D number "2", which is the first digit of "2026" and significantly larger than the others. His hair style varies but appears natural with soft waves or texture and a lively bounce. He wears a soft pastel-colored oversized shirt over a white tank top, paired with light blue jeans, embodying a pastel casual outfit. The background is a high-key studio lighting setup with a soft glow, color palette in candy pastel shades, creating a bubbly, joyful, cute, and playful mood. The composition is ultra-realistic, high-end advertising quality, with an aspect ratio of 5:4, no text included. The subject interacts naturally with the glossy pastel 3D numbers "2", "0", and the other digits "2" and "6" forming the year 2026, all placed in a clean studio environment. Use the uploaded image as the base or reference for the subject's appearance and pose.
